flextable 0.5.4
  • Overview
  • Selectors
  • Layout
  • Format visual properties
  • Format Content
  • Render as image
  • Examples
  • Function reference

Encode flextable in a document format.

format.flextable.Rd

Encode flextable in a document format, html, docx, pptx.

This function is exported so that users can create their own custom component.

# S3 method for flextable
format(x, type, ...)

Arguments

x

flextable object
type

one of pptx, docx or html.
...

unused

See also

Other flextable print function: as_raster, htmltools_value, knit_print.flextable, plot.flextable, print.flextable, save_as_html, save_as_image

Examples

ft <- flextable(head(iris, n = 2))
format(ft, type = "html")
